scripts.release:major: rm CHANGELOG.md && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: rm CHANGELOG.md && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: rm CHANGELOG.md && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-sass && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss && npm run changelog
